span.span: Standish-Sterling Community Schools mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society.

br.span: We are “Committed to Excellence”, and we work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community.

div.p:
* BOARD MEETING CANCELED *
The regular meeting of the Board that was scheduled for Monday,
April 13, 2020 has been canceled. This meeting will be rescheduled
to a future date and time. Check back here for updates.

menu.br:
The Governor announced today (4/2/2020) that Michigan schools will remain closed for the balance of the school year. The Executive Order eliminates face-to-face instruction but gives us some guidance and requirements for continuing learning for the students. Our staff will be working on the details of what this means for all of our students. The food distribution program will continue until further notice. All of the buildings are in lock-down, so please don't come to the schools yet. We will arrange for a time for everyone to come and get your things. We'll let you know what the next steps are as soon as possible!
Food Distribution Notice 4-07-2020
Due to the extension of the emergency school closure,
the food distribution schedule will continue on Mondays
and Thursdays until further notice.
Pickup locations & times remain the same.
Basics_for_Safe_Food_Handling 3-17-2020
COVID Letter 3-12-2020
COVID-19 3-6-2020
Central Michigan District Health Department
Center for Disease Control

EFAA School Wellness Policy.pdf
Standish-Sterling Community Schools is looking for community
members to become part of our Wellness Team. If you would
like to join the team, please contact Nancy Jameson at 989-846-3686
or email njameson@standish-sterling.org
The next meeting will be November 20, 201 at 3:00 p.m. in the
Jr/Sr High School Cafeteria
Positions Open: Substitutes for teachers, custodians, cooks, & paraprofessional to work as needed.
Go to PCMI Services to apply

span.span: In an effort to improve system practices, Standish-Sterling Community

span.span: onducting a Parent Survey. We value your opinion and ask that you take the time to complete

span.style: text-transform: none; line-height: normal; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; word-spacing: 0px; float: none; white-space: normal; font-stretch: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; display: inline !important; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: the survey. Please be assured that your responses to this survey will be anonymous. Your honest opinion is appreciated. Thank you for your time and attention to this matter. Please fill out the corresponding survey(s) for your children in the district (one survey per building):
